content: {"Name": "Capital District LATINOS", "Entity_Id": 2615, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "Capital District LATINOS", "More_Information": "They serve a maximum of 75 families per day. Wednesdays open 3pm and serve from 4pm-5:30pm.
